'''Ubuntu One''' is a proprietary [[File hosting service|storage application and service]] operated by [[Canonical Ltd]] and currently in private beta.
+
'''Ubuntu One''' is a [[File hosting service|storage application and service]] operated by [[Canonical Ltd]] and currently in private beta.
The service enables users to store and sync files online and between computers. Ubuntu One has a client application that only runs on Ubuntu 9.04. A free Ubuntu One account offers 2 GB of storage. Users may upgrade to 10 GB by paying a monthly fee of $10.
The service enables users to store and sync files online and between computers. Ubuntu One has a client application that only runs on Ubuntu 9.04. A free Ubuntu One account offers 2 GB of storage. Users may upgrade to 10 GB by paying a monthly fee of $10.
